  • Classes in engine.forBoard used by engine
    Class
    Description
    Board
    The Board class represents a chess board containing 64 tiles and thirty-two pieces at the start of the game.
  • Classes in engine.forBoard used by engine.forBoard
    Class
    Description
    Board
    The Board class represents a chess board containing 64 tiles and thirty-two pieces at the start of the game.
    Board.Builder
    A builder class for constructing instances of the Board class with specific configurations.
    BoardUtils
    The BoardUtils class provides methods for checking valid tile coordinates and converting between positions and coordinates.
    Move
    The `Move` class represents a move in a game of chess.
    Move.AttackMove
    The `AttackMove` class represents a move that results in attacking an opponent's piece in chess.
    Move.CastleMove
    The `CastleMove` class represents a move that involves castling, which is a special king and rook move.
    Move.MoveStatus
    Represents the possible outcomes of a chess move, including successful execution, an illegal move, or leaving the player's king in check.
    Move.PawnAttackMove
    The `PawnAttackMove` class represents a pawn attack move in chess.
    Move.PawnMove
    The `PawnMove` class represents a basic pawn move in chess.
    MoveUtils
    The `MoveUtils` class is a utility class that provides various helper methods related to chess moves and calculations.
    Tile
    The `Tile` class represents a tile on a chess board.
    Tile.EmptyTile
    The EmptyTile class represents an empty tile on a chess board.
